au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka2.experiment.mo.name: L1=10m_L2=2m_offset_rheo_jan_2012_tang
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka2.experiment.mo.initScript: # Drive attenuator to safe value driveAtt(330) # Drive detector to short position driveDet(1200,300) # Drive entrance aperture to 50 mm square driveEntRotAp(180) # Drive guide to ga driveGuide(guideConfig.ga) # Drive entrance aperture to 180 driveEntRotAp(180) #set sample ap to 10 mm sics.drive('apx', -112.35) # Drive beamstops up selBs(1) # set beamcentres sics.set('beamcenterx', 36.9) sics.set('beamcenterz', 98.0)
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka2.experiment.mo.preTransmissionScript: # Move the beamstop out driveBsx(41, 100) # Drive attenuator to 300 driveAtt(300)
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka2.experiment.mo.preScatteringScript: # Drive attenuator to safe value driveAtt(330) # Move the beamstop in driveBsx(41, 0) driveBsz(262)
